title: DeFi & Future Finance
description: Test your understanding of decentralized finance and blockchain-based financial systems

questions.question: What does DeFi stand for?
questions.explanation: DeFi stands for Decentralized Finance - financial services built on blockchain without traditional intermediaries.

questions.question: What is a smart contract?
questions.explanation: Smart contracts are self-executing programs on blockchain that automatically enforce agreement terms.

questions.question: What is yield farming in DeFi?
questions.explanation: Yield farming involves providing liquidity to DeFi protocols in exchange for token rewards and fees.
